## TinySynq.getMostRecentChange() method

Returns the most recent change for a specific record.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getMostRecentChange(params: {
        table_name: string;
        row_id: string;
        operation?: TinySynqOperation;
    }): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | { table\_name: string; row\_id: string; operation?: TinySynqOperation; } |  |

**Returns:**

any

A single change record, if one exists
